snippet: Over the weekend Gov. Chris Christie said his presidential ambitions were on hold until 2015.
abstract: New Jersey Gov Chris Christie tells top Republican donors that his presidential ambitions are on hold until 2015, amid widening state investigation into bridge closing ordered by his aides and further allegations that he has bullied local officials.
lead_paragraph: Over the weekend Gov. Chris Christie said his presidential ambitions were on hold until 2015.

headline.main: Governor Tells Donors: ‘Come See Me Next Year’
headline.print_headline: Governor Tells Donors: ‘Come See Me Next Year’
